projects.title: Permissions System Upgrade
projects.description: Built a revolutionary permissions system for LifeSTEPS, which involved redesigning logic for 100+ legacy permissions checks in PHP. Click the link to learn more about LifeSTEPS.

projects.title: Product Page Migration
projects.description: Migrated over 500 of Younique's product display pages, including their translated content, from the legacy CakePHP site to a ReactJS frontend and Node.js backend. Click the link to see an example product page.

projects.title: Younique CMS
projects.description: Built an innovative Drupal-powered CMS for Younique using PHP, which cut content creation, scheduling, and testing time by 50%. Click the link below to see the Younique homepage, powered by the CMS.

projects.title: YouTube Audio Filtering
projects.description: For our Capstone Project, my partner and I built a Google Chrome extension called YouTube Audio Filtering, that allows users to filter swearwords out of YouTube videos.
